about_the_game:
A casual roguelite game featuring a rich variety of classes, a vast array of equipment, and different types of enemies. After defeating a certain number of enemies, your class will randomly switch, with each class having multiple variants, each offering unique skills. You can fight solo, or invite friends to join your game or team up with other players online. Experience different classes, explore numerous skills, uncover hidden content, and find the equipment that best suits your playstyle. Defeat the final boss and enjoy the thrill of cooperative gameplay as you and your team conquer the game together!

------------------------------Class------------------------------

The game offers a wide variety of classes to play, with each class having 15 different variants, and each variant's skills come with different enhancements.

------------------------------Controls------------------------------

The controls are simple, using only up, down, left, and right movements, with the character's direction following the mouse. Each game lasts 30 minutes, providing a fast-paced and tightly structured experience.

------------------------------Online Play------------------------------

You can fight alone or team up with friends, or join other players' rooms to battle together. As long as one player remains alive, everyone can revive infinitely!

------------------------------Gameplay------------------------------

Defeating enemies earns you gold, which can be used to purchase equipment in the shop. Equipment can be strengthened through crafting.


------------------------------Plugin System------------------------------

After each game session, players earn plugin points equivalent to the game's difficulty level. These points can be used to unlock and upgrade plugins, which effectively enhance the player's combat capabilities. Different plugins offer various effects.
